attributes.action: Vulcon bomber to do isis mission
attributes.background: I believe that we should put the vulcon bomber to do one last mission to destroy isis as she was used as a nuclear bomber in the cold war my idea is use the vulcon bomber with a atomic bomb on it then drop it the Americans did it in 1945 it's only option otherwise we will keep going in circles.

rejection.details: Vulcan XH558 is owned and operated by Vulcan to the Sky Trust, a British charity established to maintain and operate this remarkable aircraft, and not by the UK Government.
